Selenium test for RetailCustomerController
open http://localhost:8080/thirdparty/retailcustomers?form&lang=en_US
type _authenticated_id false
type _firstName_id someFirstName1
type _lastName_id someLastName1
type _email_id some@email.com
type _customerSince_id Oct 20, 2010
clickAndWait //input[@id='proceed']
verifyText _s_org_energyos_espi_thirdparty_domain_RetailCustomer_authenticated_authenticated_id false
verifyText _s_org_energyos_espi_thirdparty_domain_RetailCustomer_firstName_firstName_id someFirstName1
verifyText _s_org_energyos_espi_thirdparty_domain_RetailCustomer_lastName_lastName_id someLastName1
verifyText _s_org_energyos_espi_thirdparty_domain_RetailCustomer_email_email_id some@email.com
verifyText _s_org_energyos_espi_thirdparty_domain_RetailCustomer_customerSince_customerSince_id Oct 20, 2010
